hero.subtitle: Hi, I'm Fernando, a passionate <color>Fullstack Developer</color> based in <color>Colombia.</color>

cardOne.title: I promote teamwork through open and constructive communication.

cardTwo.title: Adaptable to various time zones, ensuring smooth and timely communication.

cardOne.title: FRONTEND DEVELOPER
cardOne.description: In my role as a Frontend Developer for Eva Group, I made significant contributions to coding and optimizing websites, focusing on projects in Madrid, Barcelona, and other international markets. I also actively participated in product internationalization to Catalan, English, Basque, and Arabic languages.

cardTwo.title: PRE-PROFESSIONAL SOFTWARE DEVELOPMENT INTERNSHIP
cardTwo.description: I collaborated in backend development for the Deep Pharma web platform, handling critical systems such as authentication and authorization with Auth0. Additionally, I contributed to the creation of the user interface using advanced technologies like Next.js and StoryBook.

cardThree.title: FREELANCE SOFTWARE TECHNICAL WRITER
cardThree.description: I authored technical articles on software development for 4Geeks, covering a wide range of topics. Leveraging my knowledge in technologies like JavaScript, HTML, CSS, React, Python, and Pandas, I enhanced content quality and clarity of explanations.

recentProjects.title: A small selection of <color>recent projects</color>
recentProjects.description: Explore a selection of my most recent projects, developed with cutting-edge technologies for web applications. Highlights include the use of Next.js for optimal performance, Tailwind for modern design, and the Shadcn library for stylish components.

cardOne.title: Video Game <color>Comparison Platform</color>
cardOne.description: Discover the most enjoyable way to compare video game prices on major platforms and find the perfect deals for your budget. This platform provides an exceptional user experience, specially designed for video game enthusiasts in Madrid.

cardTwo.title: Car Insurance <color>Comparison Platform</color>
cardTwo.description: Discover the most efficient and friendly way to compare car insurance prices from major insurers. This platform is designed to offer an exceptional user experience, allowing residents of Barcelona to find the best deals tailored to their budget and needs.

cardThree.title: Home Rental <color>Comparison Platform</color>
cardThree.description: Embark on the search for your next vacation home with our website. Designed with a unique perspective for Arab countries, this portal is your perfect ally for discovering ideal accommodations that will enrich your holidays. It is part of the Eva Group's collection of comparison platforms.

cardFour.title: Funeral Insurance <color>Comparison Platform</color>
cardFour.description: On this web platform, you can compare different funeral insurance policies to find the one that best suits your needs. Additionally, on the Eva Insurance Blog, you will find a variety of articles explaining what funeral insurance is and how you can purchase it through our comparison platform.

academicProjects.title:
Personal projects

exploring new

technologies
academicProjects.description: In this section, I share some of the projects I have undertaken as part of my continuous learning process. These projects highlight my initiative for self-learning and my ability to apply new technologies in practical contexts.

cards.title: Live Docs Nextjs
cards.description: Live Docs is an application similar to Google Docs that allows users to securely sign up, collaborate in real-time, and receive notifications. Users can interact with each other, leave comments, invite others to join, and manage editing or viewing permissions for each user.

cards.title: Yoom Videoconference
cards.description: This project is a replica of Zoom, the popular videoconferencing platform. It allows users to securely log in, create meetings, and access various features such as session recording, screen sharing, and participant management.

footer.title: Ready to take your <color>digital presence</color> to the <color>next level?</color>
